label.code_black: An error occurred on the PC during backup.
label.code_green: The backup worked. The data is recoverable.
label.code_orange: All data could not be transferred in the day (the volume is too large, or the connection was cut off before the end of the backup)(*)(**)
label.code_orange2: The suite is extended to the next backup window. Data recovery is not possible on that date.
label.code_red: An error occurred on the server during backup. We are currently working to resolve this dysfunction.
label.code_white: PC or server is not properly registered or the backup is not activated.
label.code_yellow: The Avamar agent could not be contacted (probably cut connection). We analyze the cause of this failure.
label.module_baas.date_pcError_from: Result backups PC IN ERROR for the period from

label.module_baas.date_serverError_from: Result backups SERVERS IN ERROR for the period from

label.module_baas.support.title: Opening a ticket
label.product.name: Fast Backup
label.star1: (*) If this state continues, it will ensure that the increase in volume is normal and voluntary (eg external disk connection to the PC or server, error data duplication, etc.)
label.star2: (**) In the event that a large volume of new data to be filed on the PC or server, it is recommended to do on Friday (Avamar will repatriate data during the weekend)
